Class FlinkTableSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.flink.source.FlinkTableSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataTableSource, SystemTableSource

    public abstract class FlinkTableSource
extends Object
    A Flink ScanTableSource for paimon.
